What is the author's alternative to traditional New Year's resolutions?
Self-Care January
What has been the recent shift in New Year's resolutions?
Focusing on the month of January for extreme lifestyle changes
What does Dr. Gail Saltz say about setting extreme goals?
They have a lower probability of working and aiming for instant results offers the lowest probability of success
Why is January a difficult month for motivation?
It's the dead of winter, with cold, gray weather and early darkness
Who is Tinx and what is her approach to January?
Tinx is an influencer known as TikTok's 'big sister,' and her approach is taking January off and focusing on self-care
What does John C. Norcross say about giving oneself a break?
It is too rarely a resolution and people should resolve to lower their unrealistically high standards or critical expectations
How does Tinx prioritize herself during January?
She doesn't overcommit to work or social engagements, abstains from alcohol, gets lots of sleep, avoids stress, and gives her body a break
What is the author's personal self-care plan for January?
Cooking more, limiting certain foods, and getting back into a fitness routine
What does Dr. Gail Saltz say about willpower?
It is finite, like using a muscle, and fatigues
What is the main idea of taking January off?
Focusing on slow, sustainable, attainable growth and self-care, instead of temporary extremes
